pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"GitHub RAW 镜像仅为其他镜像服务。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rosdep-init","children":"rosdep init"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["主内容在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/rosdistro/","children":"ROS Distro 帮助"}]," 中。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# 手动模拟 rosdep init
{{sudo}}mkdir -p /etc/ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/
{{sudo}}curl -o /etc/ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ros/rosdistro/master/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"stackage-global-hints-cacheyaml","children":"stackage global-hints-cache.yaml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["主内容在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/stackage/","children":"Stackage 帮助"}]," 中。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"手动下载"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/fpco/stackage-content/master/stack/global-hints.yaml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["到 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~/.stack/pantry/global-hints-cache.yaml"}],"（在 Windows 下是 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"%APPDATA%\stack\pantry\global-hints-cache.yaml"}],"）。注意文件名不同。这是由于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"stack"}]," 暂时不支持配置该文件的上游地址。该文件需要在每当第一次用到新版本的 GHC 时更新。"]}]]}]

meta.title: GitHub RAW 镜像使用帮助
